objects.description:
This test verifies the GET INPUT Command

PREREQUISITES:
-----
* Turn RIL debug flag on
* https://wiki.mozilla.org/B2G/QA/Tips\_And\_Tricks#RIL_Debugging
* Testing of STK\_CMD\_GET\_INPUT = 0x23 in this case

* adb logcat -v threadtime | grep typeOfCommand
* 0x23(hex) or 35(dec) can be found in adb logcat
objects.name: GET INPUT Command - STK_CMD_GET_INPUT = 0x23

steps.expected:
* adb logcat -v threadtime | grep typeOfCommand
* 0x23(hex) or 35(dec) can be found in adb logcat

objects.description:
This Test Case verifies the Set Up Call (Call) command

PREREQUISITES:
-----
* Turn RIL debug flag on
* https://wiki.mozilla.org/B2G/QA/Tips\_And\_Tricks#RIL_Debugging
* Testing of STK\_CMD\_SET\_UP\_CALL = 0x10 in this case

* adb logcat -v threadtime | grep typeOfCommand
* 0x10(hex) or 16(dec) can be found in adb logcat
objects.name: Set Up Call (Call) - STK_CMD_SET_UP_CALL = 0x10

steps.expected:
If the command is correctly supported by the DuT, a call must be established to the number above mentioned.
* adb logcat -v threadtime | grep typeOfCommand
* 0x10(hex) or 16(dec) can be found in adb logcat
steps.instruction: Try to tap on a item that creates an outgoing call, e.g. customer service or voicemail from stk

objects.description:
